overview: Joe Gruca brings over 25 years of Sales Leadership, Indirect Channel and Executive management experience, in a variety of industries including enterprise software, Information Technology, and Telecommunications. Most recently he served as Vice President of North American Channel Sales for CA (a leader in the enterprise IT management software space). While at CA, he also served as Vice President of Technology Sales, managing the Pre-Sales and Solution Sales function. Prior to joining CA, Joe served as Vice President of Sales for Ingram Micro, and before that as SVP and General Manager with Global Crossing, where he led the $400M Small Business Markets Business Unit. He is a results-oriented, strategic sales and marketing leader who prides himself on building high-performing teams devoted to long term client and partner relationships.
